response.original_title: 心霊vs人間 外伝 前編 心霊現象を追い求める男
response.overview: This is the seventh horror documentary by Yuuen Kanata, a popular internet video distributor, psychic idol Ryua, Shizuku Hoshino, ZeNrA, and others. The four psychic mavericks go to ghost stories, abandoned buildings, and haunted spots. A terrifying conclusion awaits in their never-ending "solitary hide-and-seek.
response.title: Psychic vs. Human Side Story Part 1: The Man Pursuing Supernatural Phenomena

titles.title: Psychic vs Human Gaiden: Part 1 - Shinrei Genshō o Oimotomeru Otoko
